page.title: 13A Day in My Life
page.content: On a typical Sunday, I wake up about 8 a.m. and that leaves me an hour before the Church Service is due to begin. The Parish Priest is Father Luczka. After Church, my mother drives my brother Jamie and me home. Soon after Church we go to our horse riding lessons with Mr. Downes. The lesson lasts for an hour, after which we go home again. Lunch on Sunday is usually a cold meal like sandwiches etc., then we go up to town to do some shopping, mostly food shopping and we usually spend an hour and a half before returning home yet again. I watch the television programmes for a short while and then go to the kitchen to help my mother cook the evening meal. When the meal is ready, I call Dad and Jamie. When we have eaten, I have a bath and Jamie follows me and before going to bed, I watch TV.
